Description:
Microsoft returns to NVIDIA GTC 2026 in San Jose with a strong presence across conference sessions, in‑booth theater talks, live demos, and executive‑level ancillary events. Together with NVIDIA and our partner ecosystem, Microsoft is showcasing how Azure AI infrastructure enables AI training, inference, and production at global scale. Visit us at **Booth #521** to see the latest innovations in action and connect with Azure and NVIDIA experts.

## Exclusive GTC Experiences

![](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/1763445319496.jpeg)

### LEGO® Datacenter Model

Explore Azure AI infrastructure at the **Park Container**.

![](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/candy%20lounge.png)

### Candy Lounge

Visit the high-traffic candy wall for co-branded treats all day long.

![](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/networking%20lounge.png)

### Networking Lounge

Relax and recharge with comfy seating and vital charging options.

![](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/juivr.png)

### Outdoor Juice Truck

Free, refreshing beverages served during outdoor park hours.

## Sponsored Breakout Sessions

Microsoft Featured

### Reinventing Semiconductor Design with Microsoft Discovery

**S82398** · Mon, Mar 16 · 4:00 PM

![Prashant Varshney](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/1764627786112.jpeg)

Prashant Varshney

Microsoft · Semiconductor & AI Engineering

**Abstract:** Semiconductor teams face exploding design complexity and shrinking verification windows. This session shows how the Microsoft Discovery AI for Science platform, combined with Synopsys Agent Engineers, introduces an agentic approach to EDA that automates routine steps and accelerates expert decision-making on Azure.

Microsoft Featured

### Operationalizing Agentic AI at Hyperscale

**S82399** · Tue, Mar 17 · 1:00 PM

![Nitin Nagarkatte](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/1517681891648.jpeg)

Nitin Nagarkatte

Microsoft · Azure AI Infrastructure

![Anand Raman](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/1517769589184.jpeg)

Anand Raman

Microsoft · Azure AI

![Vipul Modi](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/1713380746429.jpeg)

Vipul Modi

Microsoft · AI Systems

**Abstract:** As enterprises move to agentic systems, the challenge shifts to operating intelligent agents reliably at scale. This session demonstrates how Microsoft builds AI Factories on Azure using NVIDIA technology and explores Microsoft Foundry as the control plane for deploying and operating coordinated AI agents.

## Live from GTC: AI Podcast

![Speaker Name](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/dayan.jpeg)

Dayan Rodriguez

Corporate Vice President Global Manufacturing and Mobility

![Speaker Name](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/alistair.jpeg)

Alistair Spiers

General Manager Azure Infrastructure

Live Special Feature

### A conversation with Microsoft Azure

Monday, March 16 @ 2PM

Listen & Subscribe:

[aka.ms/GTC2026Podcast](https://aka.ms/YourPodcastLink)

![Scan to Listen](https://onedrive.cloud.microsoft/a@sz7ea77e/Documents/GTC26.png)

Scan to Listen

## Earned Conference Sessions

| Date & Time | Session Title | Speakers | Companies | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Mon, Mar 16 · 5 PM | **Drive Optimal Tokens per Watt on AI Infrastructure Using Benchmarking Recipes** | Paul Edwards, Emily Potyraj | Microsoft, NVIDIA | | Tue, Mar 17 · 9 AM | **Autonomous AI Factories: Technical Preview of Agent-Native Production** | César Martinez Spessot, JP Vasseur | Microsoft, NVIDIA | | Tue, Mar 17 · 4 PM | **The Road to Intelligent Mobility: Vehicle GenAI** | Raj Paul, Thomas Evans, Bryan Goodman | Microsoft, NVIDIA, Bosch | | Wed, Mar 18 · 9 AM | **Supercharging AI with Multi-Gigawatt AI Factories** | Evan Burness, Gilad Shainer, Peter Salanki | Microsoft, NVIDIA, Meta |

### Monday, March 16

| Time | Code | Session Title | Presenter | Company | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 2:00 PM | BTH208 | **Accelerate AI Innovation on Azure with NVIDIA Run:ai** | Rob Magno | NVIDIA | | 2:30 PM | BTH202 | **Models to Machines: Deploying Agentic AI in Real-World Robotics** | Dinesh Narayanan | General Robotics | | 3:00 PM | BTH200 | **From Generalist to Enterprise-Ready: Fractal Builds Domain AI** | C. ### Tuesday, March 17

| Time | Code | Session Title | Presenter | Company | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 1:30 PM | BTH100 | **From Open Weights to Enterprise Scale: Open-Source Models** | Sharmila Chockalingam | Microsoft | | 2:00 PM | BTH212 | **Unlocking the power of memory in Teams with Personal AI** | Sam Harkness | Personal AI | | 2:30 PM | BTH111 | **Scalable LLM Inference on AKS Using NVIDIA Dynamo** | Mohamad Al jazaery, Anton Slutsky | Microsoft / NVIDIA | | 3:00 PM | BTH204 | **Innovate with Mistral AI on Microsoft Foundry** | Ian Mathew | Mistral AI | | 3:30 PM | BTH104 | **GPU-Accelerated CFD at Scale: Star-CCM+ on Azure** | Jason Scheffelmaer | Microsoft | | 4:00 PM | BTH206 | **Agentic AI for Incident Response on Microsoft Azure** | Grant Griffiths | NeuBird AI | | 4:30 PM | BTH101 | **Agentic DevOps: Evolving software with GitHub Copilot** | Glenn Wester | GitHub | | 5:00 PM | BTH209 | **Real-World AI Physics: GM & NVIDIA on Rescale** | Dinal Perera | Rescale | | 5:30 PM | BTH107 | **Intro to LoRA Fine-Tuning on Azure** | Christin Pohl | Microsoft | | 6:30 PM | - | **Raffle** | - | - |

### Wednesday, March 18

| Time | Code | Session Title | Presenter | Company | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 1:00 PM | BTH219 | **Scaling AI Infrastructure on Azure with VAST Data** | Jason Vallery | VAST Data | | 1:30 PM | BTH110 | **Physical AI and Robotics: The Next Frontier** | F. Miller, C. Souche, D. Narayanan | Microsoft | | 2:00 PM | BTH105 | **Sovereign AI options with Azure Local** | Kim Lam | Microsoft | | 2:30 PM | BTH108 | **Automating HPC Workflows with Copilot Agents** | Param Shah | Microsoft | | 3:00 PM | BTH102 | **Trustworthy Multi-Agent Workflows with Microsoft Foundry** | Brian Benz | Microsoft | | 3:30 PM | - | | - | - | | 4:00 PM | BTH106 | **Scaling Enterprise AI on ARO with NVIDIA H100 & H200** | Lachie Evenson | Microsoft | | 4:30 PM | BTH211 | **Hybrid AI Data Orchestration with WEKA NeuralMesh™** | Desiree Campbell | WEKA | | 5:00 PM | BTH202 | **NVIDIA AI Enterprise Software with NIM** | Mike Bloom | Hammerspace | | 5:30 PM | BTH203 | **Reimagining Global Supply Planning with Azure** | Dane Henshall | Kinaxis | | 6:00 PM | BTH214 | **Connected AI on Azure for Manufacturing** | Brad Pritchett | AT&T | | 6:30 PM | - | **Raffle** | - | - |

### Thursday, March 19

| Time | Code | Session Title | Presenter | Company | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 11:00 AM | BTH210 | **Physical AI: Powering Software-Defined Automation in Robotics** | Marwin Kunz, Martin George | Wandelbots | | 11:30 AM | - | **Raffle** | - | - |

## Explore Our Demo Pods

Visit the Microsoft booth to see our technology in action with live demonstrations across four dedicated pod areas.

| Pod | Focus Area | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | Pod 1 | **Azure AI Infrastructure** | End‑to‑end AI infrastructure for training and inference at scale, featuring the latest NVIDIA GPU integrations on Azure. | | Pod 2 | **Microsoft Foundry** | Our comprehensive platform for building, deploying, and operating agentic AI systems with enterprise reliability. | | Pod 3 | **Building AI Together** | Showcasing joint Microsoft and NVIDIA solutions across diverse industries, from manufacturing to retail. | | Pod 4 | **Startups Powering AI** | Discover how innovative startups are running next‑generation AI workloads on the Azure platform. |

## Ancillary Events & Networking

Join Microsoft leadership and our partner ecosystem at these exclusive networking events throughout the week.

SUNDAY · MARCH 15 · 6:00 PM

### Microsoft for Startups Executive Leadership Dinner

**Location:** Morton’s Steakhouse, San Jose

**Audience:** Startup leaders & Microsoft executives

MONDAY · MARCH 16 · 1:30 PM

### Microsoft × NVIDIA Open Meet

**Location:** Signia by Hilton · International Suite

**Audience:** Microsoft & NVIDIA executives

MONDAY · MARCH 16 · 7:30 PM

### Microsoft + NVIDIA Executive Dinner

**Location:** Il Fornaio (near SJCC)

**Audience:** Customers & executive leaders

TUESDAY · MARCH 17 · 7:30 PM

### GTC Networking Event: AI‑Accelerated Innovations Mixer

**Location:** San Pedro Square Market

**Audience:** Microsoft teams, partners, customers

WEDNESDAY · MARCH 18 · 10:30 AM

### AI Innovator’s Circle Brunch (Microsoft + NVIDIA)

**Location:** Il Fornaio Dining Room

**Audience:** Customers, startups, partners
Author: Fernando_Aznar
